job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>I am partnered with a company that is pioneering the use of note-taking app recorders! Their AI-powered collaborative works across Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams to help teams record, transcribe, search and share meeting notes.&nbsp;In addition, they are making virtual meetings accessible to all employees - allowing team members with disabilities to participate in a world that is now dominated by virtual meetings</p><p>They are currently in their Series A Funding Round, looking to rapidly grow their team over the course of the next year.&nbsp; The team is located in Mountain View, with plans to move back to in-person as soon as they can!</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>A few key details Listed below -</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Skill Requirements</strong>:</p><ul><li>5+ years of experience in Machine Learning</li><li>Strong programming skills in a scientific computing language such as Python. </li><li>Experience using frameworks for machine learning and data science like scikit-learn, pandas, NumPy</li><li>Experience working with ML tools such as Tensorflow, Keras, and Pytorch</li><li>Excellent written and oral communication skills and the capability to drive cross-functional requirements with product and engineering teams</li><li>Comfortable in a Collaborative Start-up environment</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Nice to have</strong>:</p><ul><li>Ph.D. in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, NLP, or similar</li><li>Experience with MLOps systems</li><li>A drive to keep up and build on cutting edge research</li><li>Experience with Natural Language Processing</li><li>Leadership experience</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Offer Expectations</strong>:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Competitive Salary</li><li>Awesome Benefits</li><li>Potential to grow alongside a fast-paced team!</li></ul>
